text: General Juan José Guzmán (July 1797, La Unión – 19 October 1847) was the first President of El Salvador from 14 April 1842 to 1 February 1844. ==External links== * == Notes == Category:1797 births Category:1847 deaths Category:People from La Unión Department Category:Salvadoran people of Spanish descent Category:Presidents of El Salvador Category:19th-century Salvadoran people Category:Salvadoran military personnel
title: Juan José Guzmán
